summary.span: 使用範本顯示項目的資料繫結清單控制項。

span.span: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [範本Templates](#templates) - [自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [顯示方向和配置Display Direction and Layout](#display_direction_and_layout) - [安全性Security](#security) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來顯示範本定義的資料繫結清單。Use the control to display a template-defined data bound list. 控制項支援選取和編輯。The control supports selecting and editing. ## 範本Templates 內容可操作控制項，請使用範本。The contents of the control can be manipulated by using templates. 下表列出支援的範本。The following table lists the supported templates. |範本名稱Template Name|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中替代項目的。If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the . 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置項目的目前正在編輯中。If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the . 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置頁尾區段的。If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the . 如果未定義，不會顯示頁尾區段。If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置的標頭區段。If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the . 如果未定義，不會顯示標頭區段。If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.| ||所需的範本中的項目提供內容和版面配置。Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the .| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中目前選取項目的。If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the . 如果未定義，用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中的項目之間的分隔符號。If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the . 如果未定義，不會顯示為分隔符號。If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.| 在非常小必須在定義中的項目顯示控制項。At the very minimum, the needs to be defined to display the items in the control. 其他範本可用來提供自訂的外觀控制項。Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the control. ## 自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control 外觀可自訂控制項，藉由設定不同的組件控制項的樣式屬性。The appearance of the control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style Property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||指定的樣式中替代項目的控制項。Specifies the style for alternating items in the control.| ||指定在正在編輯之項目的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the item being edited in the control.| ||指定的樣式中的頁尾控制項。Specifies the style for the footer in the control.| ||指定的標頭中的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the header in the control.| ||指定的樣式中的項目控制項。Specifies the style for the items in the control.| ||指定選取的項目中的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the selected item in the control.| ||指定項目之間分隔符號的樣式控制項。Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the control.| 您也可以顯示或隱藏控制項的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出可控制哪些部分會顯示或隱藏屬性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏頁尾區段的控制項。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||顯示或隱藏的標頭區段控制項。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| ## 顯示方向和配置Display Direction and Layout 顯示方向控制項可以垂直或水平。The display direction of a control can be vertical or horizontal. 設定屬性，以指定的顯示方向。Set the property to specify the display direction. 版面配置控制會使用屬性。The layout of the control is controlled with the property. 將此屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`會顯示資料表格式，雖然`RepeatLayout.Flow`顯示非表格結構。Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the without a table structure. ## 安全性Security `DataList`控制項可以包含控制項，可讓使用者輸入資訊。The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需有關安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[ASP.NET Web Pages 中驗證使用者輸入](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示從資料來源的項目清單。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display a list of items from a data source. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的屬性，以提供自訂的樣式替代項目控制項。Use the property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式替代項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定不同的背景色彩中替代項目的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，來控制內容中替代項目的控制項。Use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. 替代項目的外觀由控制屬性。The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the property. 若要指定替代的項目範本，請將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，來控制內容中替代項目的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項中項目的 按鈕。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目） 並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取消對中的項目所做的任何編輯控制何時`Cancel`按一下按鈕時。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/CS/datalisteditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/VB/datalisteditvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/CS/datalistedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/VB/datalistedit2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Delete`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Delete` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件從資料來源中移除選取的項目，然後重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會刪除選取的項目，在控制何時`Delete`按一下按鈕時。It deletes the selected item in the control when the `Delete` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Edit`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性，以選取的資料列，然後重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控制項的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它可讓您編輯選取的項目，在控制何時`Edit`按一下按鈕時。It allows you to edit the selected item in the control when the `Edit` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定要編輯的項目。Use the property to programmatically specify the item to edit. 您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷所選取來編輯項目的索引。You can also use this property to determine the index of the item selected for editing. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是以零為起始。The property is zero based. 若要取消選取項目，設定屬性設`-1`。To unselect an item, set the property to `-1`. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 屬性儲存在控制項狀態。The property is stored in control state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定由使用者所選取來編輯的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性設為所選取來編輯中的項目提供的自訂樣式控制項。Use the property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式來編輯所選取的項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定不同的外觀如使用者所選取來編輯的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different appearance for the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a control, defined in each template of a control, are extracted and displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容控制項由使用範本。The contents of the control are specified by using templates. 一般來說，您可以列出您想要顯示範本中的控制項。Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates. 您也可以將控制在範本中，並顯示資料表的資料列。You can also place a control in a template and display the rows of the table. 使用屬性來指定是否的資料列控制項中的每個範本定義擷取並顯示控制項。Use the property to specify whether the rows of a control defined in each template of a control are extracted and displayed. 從範本擷取的所有資料列控制項顯示在單一資料表。All rows extracted from the templates of the control are displayed in a single table. 這可讓您從其他較小的資料表建立單一資料表，並仍可維持的功能控制項。This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the control. > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供格式正確您想要包含在每個範本的控制項控制項。When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed control for each template you want to include in the control. 將顯示的資料表的資料列。Only the rows of the tables will be displayed. 在範本中的所有其他內容都會被忽略。All other content in the template will be ignored. 您必須使用控制這項功能才能正常運作。You must use a control for this feature to work properly. 控制項不是相容於這個屬性。The control is not compatible with this property. 當您建立的資料格控制項在範本中，您可以使用屬性物件，以控制資料格所跨越的資料行數目。When you create a cell for a control in a template, you can use the property of the object to control the number of columns the cell spans. 您也可以使用屬性，即可控制的資料格所跨越的資料列數目。You can also use the property to control the number of rows the cell spans. > [!NOTE] > ， ，並屬性不會影響的外觀控制當這個屬性設定為`true`。The , , and properties do not affect the appearance of the control when this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來擷取並顯示的資料列控制項的範本中定義控制項。The following code example demonstrate how to use the property to extract and display the rows of controls defined in the templates of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制頁尾區段的內容。Use the property to control the contents of the footer section. 頁尾區段的外觀由控制屬性。The appearance of the footer section is controlled by the property. > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設為`true`才能看到這個屬性。The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. 的屬性控制項繼承的樣式設定屬性。The property of the control inherits the style settings of the property. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性，屬性也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, the property will also have a red font. 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property. 您可以藉由設定覆寫繼承的樣式設定屬性。You can override the inherited style settings by setting the property. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 若要指定頁尾區段的範本，請將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a template for the footer section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制的頁尾區段的內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the footer section of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control. 方法會使用並方法來建立標頭、 頁尾、 分隔符號和 [資料] 清單中包含的資料繫結項目所代表的控制項。The method uses the and methods to create controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list. 您可以透過 [資料] 清單的資料繫結項目集合。You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the collection. 您可以存取所有的項目類型，包括標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號項目，透過集合。You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the collection. 覆寫方法，以自訂方式建立或加入至控制項控制項。Override the method to customize how controls are created or added to the control. 覆寫方法，以自訂範本控制項。Override the method to customize templates for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按一下任一按鈕時，會引發事件控制項，並在您有自訂的按鈕控制項通常使用於`CommandName`值。The event is raised when any button is clicked in the control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以選取的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to select an item from the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發之後的項目被資料繫結至控制項。The event is raised after an item is data bound to the control. 此事件為您提供來存取資料的項目之前它會顯示在用戶端上, 的最後機會。This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client. 會引發這個事件之後，已不再提供資料的項目。After this event is raised, the data item is no longer available. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示順序中的哪些項目中控制項繫結至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items in the control are bound to the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，以程式設計方式控制中的項目控制項。Use the collection to programmatically control the items in the control. 集合不會提供任何方法來新增或移除集合的項目。The collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection. 不過，您可以控制的項目內容，藉由提供的處理常式事件。However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the event. > [!NOTE] > 只有繫結至資料來源的項目包含在集合。Only items bound to the data source are contained in the collection. 標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號不會包含在集合中。The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合中的項目顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to display the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得 控制項中項目的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 物件，包含 控制項中項目的樣式屬性。

span.span: A object that contains the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 預設值為空白的 物件。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性的項目提供的自訂樣式控制項。Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂的項目樣式控制項，放置``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. 您也可以使用中的屬性以提供不同的外觀的替代項目控制項。You can also use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定不同的背景色彩中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的項目內容控制項。Use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. 中的項目外觀控制項由控制屬性。The appearance of the items in the control is controlled by the property. 若要指定的項目範本控制項，放置``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a template for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 您可以選擇性地使用中的屬性以提供不同的外觀的替代項目控制項。You can optionally use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的項目內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法會還原檢視狀態資訊控制權從所儲存的先前頁面要求方法。The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目） 並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取消對中的項目所做的任何編輯控制何時`Cancel`按一下按鈕時。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 就會引發事件時`Delete`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Delete` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件從資料來源中移除選取的項目，然後重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會刪除選取的項目，在控制何時`Delete`按一下按鈕時。It deletes the selected item in the control when the `Delete` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 就會引發事件時`Edit`按鈕中項目的控制項。The event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the control. 一般處理常式事件屬性，以選取的資料列，然後重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event sets the property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它可讓您編輯選取的項目，在控制何時`Edit`按一下按鈕時。It allows you to edit the selected item in the control when the `Edit` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 中按一下任一按鈕時，會引發事件控制項，並在您有自訂的按鈕控制項通常使用於`CommandName`值，例如`Add`，請在控制項。The event is raised when any button is clicked in the control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value, such as `Add`, in the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以選取的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to select an item from the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 中的項目時，會引發事件建立控制項、 來回行程期間和在繫結至控制項的資料。The event is raised when an item in the control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control. 事件通常用來控制內容中的資料列的外觀控制項。The event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示順序中的哪些項目中建立控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items in the control are created. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供自訂的處理常式，如事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 就會引發事件時`Update`按鈕按一下的項目。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 一般處理常式事件更新的資料集屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目），並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它可讓您更新中的選取項目輸入使用者的新值的控制項時`Update`按一下按鈕時。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定顯示項目中的資料行數目控制項。Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 例如，如果您將這個屬性設定為`5`，則控制項會在五個資料行中顯示其項目。For example, if you set this property to `5`, the control displays its items in five columns. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個屬性設定為`0`，則控制項會顯示其項目中的單一資料列或資料行，根據值屬性。If this property is set to `0`, the control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the property. 如果屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，項目會顯示在單一資料列。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row. 如果屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，單一資料行中所顯示的項目。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示在中的資料行數目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the number of columns to display in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的顯示方向控制項。Use the property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 顯示的資料行的數目一律由屬性。The number of columns displayed is always determined by the property. 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，清單中的項目是從上到下，載入的資料行中顯示，則由左至右，直到所有項目皆呈現。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果屬性設定為`3`中的項目控制項顯示在三個資料行，如下列表格所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，清單中的項目會顯示在載入從左到右的資料列，然後上至底部，直到所有項目皆呈現。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果屬性設定為`3`的項目控制項時，會顯示在三個項目，資料列上，在下表中。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以在其中指定的方向顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the direction in which the control is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否在項目控制項顯示在資料表中。Use the property to specify whether the items in the control are displayed in a table. 唯一所支援的值控制項和。The only values that are supported by the control are and . 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`，清單中的項目會顯示在資料表中。If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, the items in the list are displayed in a table. 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`，非表格結構顯示在清單中的項目。If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`, the items in the list are displayed without a table structure. 當控制項顯示資料表中，您可以使用屬性來指定格線的線條樣式。When the control is displayed in a table, you can use the property to specify a grid line style. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的配置樣式控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the layout style of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來，控制項檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的物件。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放在伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 屬性的值，然後儲存狀態伺服器控制項的生命週期階段之後保存到字串物件。The property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 儲存檢視狀態時，此字串物件會傳回給用戶端做此變數會儲存在隱藏的 HTML input 項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率方法，並修改伺服器控制項的屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)並[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來提供選取的項目中的自訂樣式控制項。Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the control. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 項目中的樣式屬性控制項到透過階層的另一個繼承自一個項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性會繼承階層架構中較低的設定項目的樣式屬性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果您指定紅色字型屬性中中的所有其他項目的樣式屬性控制項也會有紅色字型。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 這可讓您設定的單一項目的樣式屬性來提供通用控制項的外觀。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為較高階層中設定其樣式屬性的項目樣式屬性。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，您可以在其中指定藍色的字型屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型屬性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出的階層架構順序從最高到最低。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |優先順序Precedence|樣式屬性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自訂樣式，針對選取的項目，放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出的開頭的樣式屬性``標記。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定選取的項目中的自訂背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制所選項目的內容。Use the property to control the contents of the selected item. 選取項目的外觀由控制屬性。The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the property. 若要指定針對選取的項目範本，請將``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a template for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的選取項目的內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否要將標頭區段顯示在控制項。Use the property to specify whether the header section is displayed in the control. 您可以設定來控制標頭區段的外觀屬性。You can control appearance of the header section by setting the property. 標頭區段的內容由控制屬性。The contents of the header section are controlled by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示在標頭區段控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the header section in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event UpdateCommand As DataListCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項中項目的 按鈕。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Update`按鈕按一下的項目。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 一般處理常式事件更新的資料集屬性設`-1`（若要取消選取項目），並再重新繫結至資料控制項。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在控制項中的輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它可讓您更新中的選取項目輸入使用者的新值的控制項時`Update`按一下按鈕時。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
